Sunset | 6:00:00 P.M.
Before I head out, 
                a coworker stops me. 
He asks me to join 
                    him on a new project. 
It will pay well, but it will            
          require me to work overtime.
I get ready to
work late

head home

8081 designers are prioritizing work this evening.

_designers who prioritize [priority] are learning something on the job [learning opp]

_designers who have [years of experience] on the job feel they are learning something everyday [learning opp]

2836 designers are thinking about utilizing their fitness and wellness benefits this evening.

426 designers are thankful for the childcare benefits and looking forward to get back home.

There are 3565 designers who are enjoying their paid parental leave tonight.
